新指南旨在改善儿童支原体肺炎的诊断和治疗中国医学协会已发布了新的指南，以诊断和治疗儿童的支原体肺炎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/New-guidelines-aim-to-improve-diagnosis-and-treatment-of-mycoplasma-pneumoniae-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/new-guidelines-aim-to-improve-diagrove-diagrove-diaregnosis-and-wareatment-of-mycoplasma-pneumoniaiae-in-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6bd5f6f4-a10d-4B63-BA4F-7395DF8486B1 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 12:18:00 -0400 New guidelines aim to improve diagnosis and treatment of mycoplasma pneumoniae in children
联邦卫生机构的解雇裁员办公室，发布公共记录根据透明的倡导者和卫生专家的说法，公众访问记录疾病处理，有缺陷的产品和安全失误的政府记录将在联邦卫生和公共服务部的大规模开枪扫除负责释放记录的工作人员之后放缓。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/firings-at-federal-health-health-agencies-decimate-decimate-decimate-decimate-decimate-that-rease-public-public-records.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/firings-at-federal-health-health-agecies-decimate-decimate-decimate-felices-that-rease-public-public-records.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1fcc46f-c7e2-44AD-8F51-171615382707 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 12:04:54 -0400 Firings at federal health agencies decimate offices that release public records
用精度医学预测皮肤利什曼病的治疗失败全世界近一百万人每年都会受到皮肤利什曼病的困扰，皮肤利什曼病是由利什曼原虫寄生虫引起的毁灭性皮肤感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/predicting-treatment-failure-in-cutaneous-cutaneous-leishmaniasis-with-precision-precision-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/predicting-wareatment-failure-in-cutaneous-cutaneous-leishmaniasis-with-precision-precision-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c83b5cd0-49fe-4d8e-4d8e-a737-6A6EE81E4440D Mon, 07 Apr 2025 10:31:12 -0400 Predicting treatment failure in cutaneous leishmaniasis with precision medicine
桥接数字鸿沟，以改善所有人的心脏健康使用基于技术的健康解决方案，例如健身追踪器，智能手表和移动健康应用程序，已经显示出有可能帮助人们改善其心血管健康管理的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/bridging-the-the-digital-divide-to-to-improve-health-health-health-for-all.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/bridging-the-digital-digital-divide-to-improve-health-health-health-for-all.all.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2fe312f8-0d9c-4d83-847e-964202936667 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 10:18:53 -0400 Bridging the digital divide to improve heart health for all

AI工具有助于跟踪多发性硬化症患者的治疗进展UCL研究人员已经开发了一种新的人工智能（AI）工具，可以帮助解释和评估多发性硬化症患者（MS）的治疗良好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/ai-tool-helps-track-track-wareatment-progress-in-multiple-sclerosis-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/ai-tool-helps-track-track-treatment-progress-in-multiple-sclerosis-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1E62140-303D-4C05-9E9C-72D4EF26B72D Mon, 07 Apr 2025 09:48:37 -0400 AI tool helps track treatment progress in multiple sclerosis patients
研究发现Sjögren综合征腺体损伤的根本原因Sjögren's综合征是一种慢性自身免疫性疾病，在全球范围内影响数百万，尤其是女性，导致口腔和眼睛的干燥不舒服。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/research-uncovers-root-cause-cause-of-gland-gland-damage-in-sjogrens-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/research-uncovers-root-cause-cause-of-gland-gland-damage-in-sjogrens-sjogrens-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd2222af-2b17-4ba9-bafe-a3A8CBDD3794 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 08:33:44 -0400 Research uncovers root cause of gland damage in Sjögren's syndrome
长期空气污染威胁的老年人的大脑健康长期暴露于高水平的空气污染可能会损害英格兰老年人的大脑健康，这是UCL研究人员领导的一项新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/brain-health-inger-inger------------------------ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/brain-health-inder--in--in--in--in----------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96EE280C-5CCE-4EEE-8803-40BFA4C6F7C5 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 08:26:36 -0400 Brain health in older adults threatened by prolonged air pollution
在大型研究中，多动症药物对心脏健康的影响很小由南安普敦大学（University of Southampton）领导的一项新研究发现，多动症的药物在数周或几个月后对血压和心率的总体影响总体上很小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/adhd-medications-show-minimal-iminimal-impact-on-hearthealth-health-health-narde in-large-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/adhd-medications-show-minimal-inimal-impact-on-heart-health-health-health-health-narge-pudy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc65fb25-17e1-4A39-9715-7318090A2A28 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 08:08:31 -0400 ADHD medications show minimal impact on heart health in large study
新的抗体研究激发了人们对更好百日咳疫苗的希望百日咳或百日咳，曾经是美国儿童的主要死亡原因，在1940年代引入疫苗之前。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/new-antibody-research-sparks-hope-for-better-better-whooping-whooping-cough-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/new-antibody-research-sparks-sparks-hope-for-better-better-whooping-whooping-cough-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d9b6f0e-b242-49dc-8266-CF6B3917BB23 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 07:56:07 -0400 New antibody research sparks hope for better whooping cough vaccines
